title: GENERAL
fullText:
The IES shall be connected by either fixed installation wiring, or by a connector or coupling arrangement using flexible cord, to a dedicated circuit on a switchboard. Connector or coupling use shall be in accordance with Clause 3.2.3.

Auxiliary equipment for use with the IES may be connected to the main switch (inverter supply). Where a socket-outlet is used, it shall only be accessed by use of key or a tool and for exclusive use with IES auxiliary equipment.
